250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e如何全局捕获panic级别错误:\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003edefer\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;recover();\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;lib.Log4e(\u0026quot;Panic\u0026nbsp;error\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;err)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}()\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e1. 需要注意的是捕获到pannic之后， 程序的执行点不会回到触发pannic的地方，需要程序再次执行， 一些框架支持这一点，比如martini里面有c.Next()。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e2. 如果程序main里启动了多个goroutine， 每个goroutine里面都应该捕获pannic级别错误， 否则某个goroutine触发panic级别错误之后，整个程序退出， 这是非常不合理的。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e最容易出错的地方：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e使用指针，但是没有判断指针是否为nil， Golang中array， struct是值语义， slice，map， chanel是引用传递。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e如何获取程序执行栈:\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003edefer\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;recover();\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;var\u0026nbsp;st\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;func(all\u0026nbsp;bool)\u0026nbsp;string\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;Reserve\u0026nbsp;1K\u0026nbsp;buffer\u0026nbsp;at\u0026nbsp;first\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;buf\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;make([]byte,\u0026nbsp;512)\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;size\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;runtime.Stack(buf,\u0026nbsp;all)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;The\u0026nbsp;size\u0026nbsp;of\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;buffer\u0026nbsp;may\u0026nbsp;be\u0026nbsp;not\u0026nbsp;enough\u0026nbsp;to\u0026nbsp;hold\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;stacktrace,\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;so\u0026nbsp;double\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;buffer\u0026nbsp;size\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;size\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;len(buf)\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;buf\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;make([]byte,\u0026nbsp;len(buf)\u0026lt;\u0026lt;1)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;continue\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;break\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;string(buf)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;lib.Log4e(\u0026quot;panic:\u0026quot;\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;toString(err)\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;\\nstack:\u0026quot;\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;st(false))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}()\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e具体方法就是调用 runtime.Stack。\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e如何执行异步任务：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e比如用户提交email, 给用户发邮件， 发邮件的步骤是比较耗时的， 这个场景适合可以使用异步任务：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003eresult\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;global.ResponseResult{ErrorCode:\u0026nbsp;0,\u0026nbsp;ErrorMsg:\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;GetInviteCode\u0026nbsp;success!\u0026quot;}\nrender.JSON(200,\u0026nbsp;\u0026amp;result)\ngo\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;type\u0026nbsp;data\u0026nbsp;struct\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;Url\u0026nbsp;string\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;name\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;beta_test\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;subject\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;We\u0026nbsp;would\u0026nbsp;like\u0026nbsp;to\u0026nbsp;invite\u0026nbsp;you\u0026nbsp;to\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;private\u0026nbsp;beta\u0026nbsp;of\u0026nbsp;Screenshot.\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;url\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;config.HttpProto\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;r.Host\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;/user/register/\u0026quot;\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;*uniqid\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;html\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;ParseMailTpl(\u0026amp;name,\u0026nbsp;\u0026amp;beta_test_mail_content,\u0026nbsp;data{url})\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;this.SendMail(mail,\u0026nbsp;subject,\u0026nbsp;html.String())\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;lib.Log4w(\u0026quot;GetInviteCode,\u0026nbsp;SendMail\u0026nbsp;faild\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;mail,\u0026nbsp;uniqid,\u0026nbsp;e)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\u0026nbsp;else\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;lib.Log4w(\u0026quot;GetInviteCode,\u0026nbsp;SendMail\u0026nbsp;success\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;mail,\u0026nbsp;uniqid)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}()\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e思路是启动一个goroutine执行异步的操作， 当前goroutine继续向下执行。特别需要注意的是新启动的个goroutine如果对全局变量有读写操作的话，需要注意避免发生竞态条件， 可能需要加锁。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e如何使用定时器：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e通常情况下， 写一些定时任务需要用到crontab， 在Golang里面是不需要的， 提供了非常好用的定时器。举例如下：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003efunc\u0026nbsp;Init()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;ticker\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;time.NewTicker(30\u0026nbsp;*\u0026nbsp;time.Minute)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;select\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;c\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;-global.TaskCmdChannel:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;switch\u0026nbsp;*c\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;a\u0026quot;:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//todo\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;c\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;-global.TaskImageMessageChannel:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;new(model.TaskModel)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.Init()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.CreateImageMessage(c)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;nil\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;-ticker.C:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;new(model.TaskModel)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.Init()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.CleanUserExpiredSessionKey()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;nil\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e多goroutine执行如果避免发生竞态条件：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eData races are among the most common and hardest to debug types of bugs in concurrent systems. A data race occurs when two goroutines access the same variable concurrently and at least one of the accesses is a write. See the The Go Memory Model for details.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e官方相关说明：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://blog.golang.org/race-detector\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(0, 95, 169);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-size: 15px; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003ehttp://blog.golang.org/race-detector\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://golang.org/ref/mem\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(0, 95, 169);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-size: 15px; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003ehttp://golang.org/ref/mem\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e多goroutine执行，访问全局的变量，比如map，可能会发生竞态条件， 如何检查呢？首先在编译的时候指定 -race参数，指定这个参数之后，编译出来的程序体积大一倍以上， 另外cpu，内存消耗比较高，适合测试环境， 但是发生竞态条件的时候会panic，有详细的错误信息。go内置的数据结构\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold;\"\u003earray，slice， map都不是线程安全的\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e没有设置runtime.GOMAXPROCS会有竞态条件的问题吗？\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e答案是没有， 因为没有设置runtime.GOMAXPROCS的情况下， 所有的goroutine都是在一个原生的系统thread里面执行， 自然不会有竞态条件。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e如何充分利用CPU多核：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eruntime.GOMAXPROCS(runtime.NumCPU() * 2)\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e以上是根据经验得出的比较合理的设置。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e解决并发情况下的竞态条件的方法：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e1. \u0026nbsp;channel， 但是channel并不能解决所有的情况，channel的底层实现里面也有用到锁， 某些情况下channel还不一定有锁高效， 另外channel是Golang里面最强大也最难掌握的一个东西， 如果发生阻塞不好调试。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e2. 加锁， 需要注意高并发情况下，锁竞争也是影响性能的一个重要因素， 使用读写锁，在很多情况下更高效， 举例如下：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003evar\u0026nbsp;mu\u0026nbsp;sync.RWMutex\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;…\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;mu.RLock()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;defer\u0026nbsp;mu.RUnlock()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;conns\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;h.all_connections[img_id]\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;_,\u0026nbsp;c\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;range\u0026nbsp;conns\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;c\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;/*||\u0026nbsp;c.uid\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;uid\u0026nbsp;*/\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;continue\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;select\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;c.send\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;-\u0026nbsp;[]byte(message):\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;default:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;h.conn_unregister(c)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e使用锁有个主意的地方是避免死锁，比如循环加锁。\u0026nbsp;\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e3. 原子操作（CAS）, Golang的atomic包对原子操作提供支持，Golang里面锁的实现也是用的原子操作。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e获取程序绝对路径：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;Golang编译出来之后是独立的可执行程序， 不过很多时候需要读取配置，由于执行目录有时候不在程序所在目录，路径的问题经常让人头疼，正确获取绝对路径非常重要， 方法如下：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003efunc\u0026nbsp;GetCurrPath()\u0026nbsp;string\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;file,\u0026nbsp;_\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;exec.LookPath(os.Args[0])\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;path,\u0026nbsp;_\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;filepath.Abs(file)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;index\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;strings.LastIndex(path,\u0026nbsp;string(os.PathSeparator))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;ret\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;path[:index]\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;ret\n}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eGolang函数默认参数：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;大家都知道Golang是一门简洁的语言， 不支持函数默认参数. 这个特性有些情况下确实是有用的，如果不支持，往往需要重写函数，或者多写一个函数。其实这个问题非常好解决， 举例如下：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003efunc\u0026nbsp;(this\u0026nbsp;*ImageModel)\u0026nbsp;GetImageListCount(project_id\u0026nbsp;int64,\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;paramter_optional\u0026nbsp;...int)\u0026nbsp;int\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;var\u0026nbsp;t\u0026nbsp;int\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;expire_time\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;600\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;len(paramter_optional)\u0026nbsp;\u0026gt;\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;expire_time\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;paramter_optional[0]\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;...\n}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003ego\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;profServeMux\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;http.NewServeMux()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;profServeMux.HandleFunc(\u0026quot;/debug/pprof/\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;pprof.Index)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;profServeMux.HandleFunc(\u0026quot;/debug/pprof/cmdline\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;pprof.Cmdline)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;profServeMux.HandleFunc(\u0026quot;/debug/pprof/profile\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;pprof.Profile)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;profServeMux.HandleFunc(\u0026quot;/debug/pprof/symbol\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;pprof.Symbol)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;http.ListenAndServe(\u0026quot;:7789\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;profServeMux)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;panic(err)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}()\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\"\u003ego tool pprof分析。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 15px; font-family: Georgia; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 255);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e如何进行程序调试：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;对于调试，每个人理解不一样， 如果要调试程序功能， 重新编译即可， Golang的编译速度极快。如果在开发的时候调试程序逻辑， 一般用log即可， Golang里面最好用的log库是log4go， 支持log级别。如果要进行断点调试， GoEclipse之类的是支持的， 依赖Mingw和GDB， 我个人不习惯这种调试方法。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 15px; font-family: Georgia; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 15px; font-family: Georgia; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e守护进程（daemon）\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e下面给出完整的真正可用的例子：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003epackage\u0026nbsp;main\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\nimport\u0026nbsp;(\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;fmt\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;log\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;os\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;runtime\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;syscall\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;time\u0026quot;\n)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\nfunc\u0026nbsp;daemon(nochdir,\u0026nbsp;noclose\u0026nbsp;int)\u0026nbsp;int\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;var\u0026nbsp;ret,\u0026nbsp;ret2\u0026nbsp;uintptr\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;var\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;syscall.Errno\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;darwin\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;runtime.GOOS\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;darwin\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;already\u0026nbsp;a\u0026nbsp;daemon\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;syscall.Getppid()\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;1\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;0\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;fork\u0026nbsp;off\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;parent\u0026nbsp;process\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;ret,\u0026nbsp;ret2,\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;syscall.RawSyscall(syscall.SYS_FORK,\u0026nbsp;0,\u0026nbsp;0,\u0026nbsp;0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;-1\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;failure\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;ret2\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;os.Exit(-1)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;handle\u0026nbsp;exception\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;darwin\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;darwin\u0026nbsp;\u0026amp;\u0026amp;\u0026nbsp;ret2\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;1\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;ret\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;0\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;we\u0026nbsp;got\u0026nbsp;a\u0026nbsp;good\u0026nbsp;PID,\u0026nbsp;then\u0026nbsp;we\u0026nbsp;call\u0026nbsp;exit\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;parent\u0026nbsp;process.\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;ret\u0026nbsp;\u0026gt;\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;os.Exit(0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;/*\u0026nbsp;Change\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;file\u0026nbsp;mode\u0026nbsp;mask\u0026nbsp;*/\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;_\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;syscall.Umask(0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;create\u0026nbsp;a\u0026nbsp;new\u0026nbsp;SID\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;child\u0026nbsp;process\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;s_ret,\u0026nbsp;s_errno\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;syscall.Setsid()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;s_errno\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;log.Printf(\u0026quot;Error:\u0026nbsp;syscall.Setsid\u0026nbsp;errno:\u0026nbsp;%d\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;s_errno)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;s_ret\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;-1\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;nochdir\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;os.Chdir(\u0026quot;/\u0026quot;)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;noclose\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;f,\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;os.OpenFile(\u0026quot;/dev/null\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;os.O_RDWR,\u0026nbsp;0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;fd\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;f.Fd()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;syscall.Dup2(int(fd),\u0026nbsp;int(os.Stdin.Fd()))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;syscall.Dup2(int(fd),\u0026nbsp;int(os.Stdout.Fd()))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;syscall.Dup2(int(fd),\u0026nbsp;int(os.Stderr.Fd()))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;0\n}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\nfunc\u0026nbsp;main()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;daemon(0,\u0026nbsp;1)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;fmt.Println(\u0026quot;hello\u0026quot;)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;time.Sleep(1\u0026nbsp;*\u0026nbsp;time.Second)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e代码热更新：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e代码热更新一直是解释型语言比较擅长的，Golang里面不是做不到，只是稍微麻烦一些， 就看必要性有多大。如果是线上在线人数很多， 业务非常重要的场景， 还是有必要， 一般情况下没有必要。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003col style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 5px 2px 5px 50px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\"\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e更新配置.\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e因为配置文件一般是个json或者ini格式的文件，是不需要编译的， 在线更新配置还是相对比较容易的， 思路就是使用信号， 比如SIGUSER2， 程序在信号处理函数中重新加载配置即可。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e热更新代码.\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e目前网上有多种第三方库， 实现方法大同小异。先编译代码(这一步可以使用fsnotify做到监控代码变化，自动编译)，关键是下一步graceful restart进程，实现方法可参考：\u003c/span\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://grisha.org/blog/2014/06/03/graceful-restart-in-golang/\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(0, 95, 169);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003ehttp://grisha.org/blog/2014/06/03/graceful-restart-in-golang/\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;也是创建子进程，杀死父进程的方法。\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ol\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e条件编译:\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e条件编译时一个非常有用的特性，一般一个项目编译出一个可执行文件，但是有些情况需要编译成多个可执行文件，执行不同的逻辑，这比通过命令行参数执行不同的逻辑更清晰.比如这样一个场景，一个web项目，是常驻进程的， 但是有时候需要执行一些程序步骤初始化数据库，导入数据，执行一个特定的一次性的任务等。假如项目中有一个main.go, 里面定义了一个main函数，同目录下有一个task.go函数，里面也定义了一个main函数，正常情况下这是无法编译通过的， 会提示“main redeclared”。解决办法是使用go build 的-tags参数。步骤如下(以windows为例说明)：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e1.在main.go头部加上// +build main\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e2. 在task.go头部加上// +build task\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e3. 编译住程序：go build -tags \u0026#39;main\u0026#39;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e4. 编译task：go build -tags \u0026#39;task\u0026#39; -o task.exe\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e官方说明：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eBuild Constraints\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eA build constraint is a line comment beginning with the directive \u0026nbsp;+build that lists the conditions under which a file should be included in the package. Constraints may appear in any kind of source file (not just Go), but they must appear near the top of the file, preceded only by blank lines and other line comments.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eTo distinguish build constraints from package documentation, a series of build constraints must be followed by a blank line.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003efunc\u0026nbsp;initRedis(host\u0026nbsp;string)\u0026nbsp;*redis.Pool\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;\u0026amp;redis.Pool{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;MaxIdle:\u0026nbsp;64,\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;IdleTimeout:\u0026nbsp;60\u0026nbsp;*\u0026nbsp;time.Second,\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;TestOnBorrow:\u0026nbsp;func(c\u0026nbsp;redis.Conn,\u0026nbsp;t\u0026nbsp;time.Time)\u0026nbsp;error\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;_,\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;c.Do(\u0026quot;PING\u0026quot;)\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;err\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;},\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;Dial:\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;(redis.Conn,\u0026nbsp;error)\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;c,\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;redis.Dial(\u0026quot;tcp\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;host)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;nil,\u0026nbsp;err\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;_,\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;c.Do(\u0026quot;SELECT\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;config.RedisDb)\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;c,\u0026nbsp;err\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;},\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e另外使用的时候也要把连接放回到池子里面， 否则也会导致连接数居高不下。用完之后调用rd.Close()， 这个Close并不是真的关闭连接，而是放回到池子里面。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003edefer\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;recover();\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;lib.Log4e(\u0026quot;Panic\u0026nbsp;error\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;err)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}()\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e1. 需要注意的是捕获到pannic之后， 程序的执行点不会回到触发pannic的地方，需要程序再次执行， 一些框架支持这一点，比如martini里面有c.Next()。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e2. 如果程序main里启动了多个goroutine， 每个goroutine里面都应该捕获pannic级别错误， 否则某个goroutine触发panic级别错误之后，整个程序退出， 这是非常不合理的。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e最容易出错的地方：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e使用指针，但是没有判断指针是否为nil， Golang中array， struct是值语义， slice，map， chanel是引用传递。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e如何获取程序执行栈:\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003edefer\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;recover();\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;var\u0026nbsp;st\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;func(all\u0026nbsp;bool)\u0026nbsp;string\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;Reserve\u0026nbsp;1K\u0026nbsp;buffer\u0026nbsp;at\u0026nbsp;first\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;buf\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;make([]byte,\u0026nbsp;512)\n\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;size\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;runtime.Stack(buf,\u0026nbsp;all)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;The\u0026nbsp;size\u0026nbsp;of\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;buffer\u0026nbsp;may\u0026nbsp;be\u0026nbsp;not\u0026nbsp;enough\u0026nbsp;to\u0026nbsp;hold\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;stacktrace,\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;so\u0026nbsp;double\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;buffer\u0026nbsp;size\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u00 style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e具体方法就是调用 runtime.Stack。\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e如何执行异步任务：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: 这个场景适合可以使用异步任务：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003eresult\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;global.ResponseResult{ErrorCode:\u0026nbsp;0,\u0026nbsp;ErrorMsg:\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;GetInviteCode\u0026nbsp;success!\u0026quot;}\nrender.JSON(200,\u0026nbsp;\u0026amp;result)\ngo\u0026nbsp;func()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;type\u0026nbsp;data\u0026nbsp;struct\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;Url\u0026nbsp;string\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;name\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;beta_test\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;subject\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;We\u0026nbsp;would\u0026nbsp;like\u0026nbsp;to\u0026nbsp;invite\u0026nbsp;you\u0026nbsp;to\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;private\u0026nbsp;beta\u0026nbsp;of\u0026nbsp;Screenshot.\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;url\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;config.HttpProto\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;r.Host\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;/user/register/\u0026quot;\u0026nbsp;+\u0026nbsp;*uniqid\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;html\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;ParseMailTpl(\u0026amp;name,\u0026nbsp;\u0026amp;beta_test_mail_content,\u0026nbsp;data{url})\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;this.SendMail(mail,\u0026nbsp;subject,\u0026nbsp;html.String())\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;lib.Log4w(\u0026quot;GetInviteCode,\u0026nbsp;SendMail\u0026nbsp;faild\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;mail,\u0026nbsp;uniqid,\u0026nbsp;e)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\u0026nbsp;else\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;lib.Log4w(\u0026quot;GetInviteCode,\u0026nbsp;SendMail\u0026nbsp;success\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;mail,\u0026nbsp;uniqid)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}()\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e思路是启动一个goroutine执行异步的操作， 当前goroutine继续向下执行。特别需要注意的是新启动的个goroutine如果对全局变量有读写操作的话，需要注意避免发生竞态条件， 可能需要加锁。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e如何使用定时器：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e通常情况下， 写一些定时任务需要用到crontab， 在Golang里面是不需要的， 提供了非常好用的定时器。举例如下：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003efunc\u0026nbsp;Init()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;ticker\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;time.NewTicker(30\u0026nbsp;*\u0026nbsp;time.Minute)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;select\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;c\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;-global.TaskCmdChannel:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;switch\u0026nbsp;*c\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;a\u0026quot;:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//todo\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;c\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;-global.TaskImageMessageChannel:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;new(model.TaskModel)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.Init()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.CreateImageMessage(c)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;nil\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;case\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;-ticker.C:\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;new(model.TaskModel)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.Init()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m.CleanUserExpiredSessionKey()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;m\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;nil\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e多goroutine执行如果避免发生竞态条件：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eData races are among the most common and hardest to debug types of bugs in concurrent systems. A data race occurs when two goroutines access the same variable concurrently and at least one of the accesses is a write. See the The Go Memory Model for details.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e官方相关说明：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://blog.golang.org/race-detector\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(0, 95, 169);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-size: 15px; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003ehttp://blog.golang.org/race-detector\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://golang.org/ref/mem\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(0, 95, 169);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-size: 15px; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003ehttp://golang.org/ref/mem\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e多goroutine执行，访问全局的变量，比如map，可能会发生竞态条件， 如何检查呢？首先在编译的时候指定 -race参数，指定这个参数之后，编译出来的程序体积大一倍以上， 另外cpu，内存消耗比较高，适合测试环境， 但是发生竞态条件的时候会panic，有详细的错误信息。go内置的数据结构\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold;\"\u003earray，slice， map都不是线程安全的\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e没有设置runtime.GOMAXPROCS会有竞态条件的问题吗？\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e答案是没有， 因为没有设置runtime.GOMAXPROCS的情况下， 所有的goroutine都是在一个原生的系统thread里面执行， 自然不会有竞态条件。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e如何充分利用CPU多核：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eruntime.GOMAXPROCS(runtime.NumCPU() * 2)\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e以上是根据经验得出的比较合理的设置。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; line-height: 27px; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e解决并发情况下的竞态条件的方法：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e1. \u0026nbsp;channel， 但是channel并不能解决所有的情况，channel的底层实现里面也有用到锁， 某些情况下channel还不一定有锁高效， 另外channel是Golang里面最强大也最难掌握的一个东西， 如果发生阻塞不好调试。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e2. 加锁， 需要注意高并发情况下，锁竞争也是影响性能的一个重要因素， 使用读写锁，在很多情况下更高效， 举例如下：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline;\"\u003e使用锁有个主意的地方是避免死锁，比如循环加锁。\u0026nbsp;\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan Golang的atomic包对原子操作提供支持，Golang里面锁的实现也是用的原子操作。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; 不过很多时候需要读取配置，由于执行目录有时候不在程序所在目录，路径的问题经常让人头疼，正确获取绝对路径非常重要， 方法如下：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;对于调试，每个人理解不一样， 如果要调试程序功能， 重新编译即可， Golang的编译速度极快。如果在开发的时候调试程序逻辑， 一般用log即可， Golang里面最好用的log库是log4go， 支持log级别。如果要进行断点调试， GoEclipse之类的是支持的， 依赖Mingw和GDB， 我个人不习惯这种调试方法。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 15px; style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial;
