250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e下面给出完整的真正可用的例子：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cpre class=\"brush:groovy;toolbar:false\"\u003epackage\u0026nbsp;main\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\nimport\u0026nbsp;(\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;fmt\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;log\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;os\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;runtime\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;syscall\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;time\u0026quot;\n)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\nfunc\u0026nbsp;daemon(nochdir,\u0026nbsp;noclose\u0026nbsp;int)\u0026nbsp;int\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;var\u0026nbsp;ret,\u0026nbsp;ret2\u0026nbsp;uintptr\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;var\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;syscall.Errno\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;darwin\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;runtime.GOOS\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;\u0026quot;darwin\u0026quot;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;already\u0026nbsp;a\u0026nbsp;daemon\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;syscall.Getppid()\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;1\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;0\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;fork\u0026nbsp;off\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;parent\u0026nbsp;process\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;ret,\u0026nbsp;ret2,\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;syscall.RawSyscall(syscall.SYS_FORK,\u0026nbsp;0,\u0026nbsp;0,\u0026nbsp;0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;err\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;-1\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;failure\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;ret2\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;os.Exit(-1)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;handle\u0026nbsp;exception\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;darwin\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;darwin\u0026nbsp;\u0026amp;\u0026amp;\u0026nbsp;ret2\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;1\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;ret\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;0\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;we\u0026nbsp;got\u0026nbsp;a\u0026nbsp;good\u0026nbsp;PID,\u0026nbsp;then\u0026nbsp;we\u0026nbsp;call\u0026nbsp;exit\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;parent\u0026nbsp;process.\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;ret\u0026nbsp;\u0026gt;\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;os.Exit(0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;/*\u0026nbsp;Change\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;file\u0026nbsp;mode\u0026nbsp;mask\u0026nbsp;*/\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;_\u0026nbsp;=\u0026nbsp;syscall.Umask(0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;//\u0026nbsp;create\u0026nbsp;a\u0026nbsp;new\u0026nbsp;SID\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;the\u0026nbsp;child\u0026nbsp;process\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;s_ret,\u0026nbsp;s_errno\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;syscall.Setsid()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;s_errno\u0026nbsp;!=\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;log.Printf(\u0026quot;Error:\u0026nbsp;syscall.Setsid\u0026nbsp;errno:\u0026nbsp;%d\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;s_errno)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;s_ret\u0026nbsp;\u0026lt;\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;-1\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;nochdir\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;os.Chdir(\u0026quot;/\u0026quot;)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;noclose\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;0\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;f,\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;os.OpenFile(\u0026quot;/dev/null\u0026quot;,\u0026nbsp;os.O_RDWR,\u0026nbsp;0)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;if\u0026nbsp;e\u0026nbsp;==\u0026nbsp;nil\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;fd\u0026nbsp;:=\u0026nbsp;f.Fd()\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;syscall.Dup2(int(fd),\u0026nbsp;int(os.Stdin.Fd()))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;syscall.Dup2(int(fd),\u0026nbsp;int(os.Stdout.Fd()))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;syscall.Dup2(int(fd),\u0026nbsp;int(os.Stderr.Fd()))\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;return\u0026nbsp;0\n}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\nfunc\u0026nbsp;main()\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;daemon(0,\u0026nbsp;1)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;for\u0026nbsp;{\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;fmt.Println(\u0026quot;hello\u0026quot;)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;time.Sleep(1\u0026nbsp;*\u0026nbsp;time.Second)\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;}\n\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\n}\u003c/pre\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e进程管理：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e个人比较喜欢用supervisord来进行进程管理，支持进程自动重启，supervisord是一个python开发的工具， 用pip安装即可。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e代码热更新：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e代码热更新一直是解释型语言比较擅长的，Golang里面不是做不到，只是稍微麻烦一些， 就看必要性有多大。如果是线上在线人数很多， 业务非常重要的场景， 还是有必要， 一般情况下没有必要。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003col style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 5px 2px 5px 50px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; line-height: 25px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\"\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e更新配置.\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e因为配置文件一般是个json或者ini格式的文件，是不需要编译的， 在线更新配置还是相对比较容易的， 思路就是使用信号， 比如SIGUSER2， 程序在信号处理函数中重新加载配置即可。\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e热更新代码.\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e目前网上有多种第三方库， 实现方法大同小异。先编译代码(这一步可以使用fsnotify做到监控代码变化，自动编译)，关键是下一步graceful restart进程，实现方法可参考：\u003c/span\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://grisha.org/blog/2014/06/03/graceful-restart-in-golang/\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(0, 95, 169);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003ehttp://grisha.org/blog/2014/06/03/graceful-restart-in-golang/\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;也是创建子进程，杀死父进程的方法。\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px;\"/\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ol\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; font-weight: bold; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e条件编译:\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e条件编译时一个非常有用的特性，一般一个项目编译出一个可执行文件，但是有些情况需要编译成多个可执行文件，执行不同的逻辑，这比通过命令行参数执行不同的逻辑更清晰.比如这样一个场景，一个web项目，是常驻进程的， 但是有时候需要执行一些程序步骤初始化数据库，导入数据，执行一个特定的一次性的任务等。假如项目中有一个main.go, 里面定义了一个main函数，同目录下有一个task.go函数，里面也定义了一个main函数，正常情况下这是无法编译通过的， 会提示“main redeclared”。解决办法是使用go build 的-tags参数。步骤如下(以windows为例说明)：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e1.在main.go头部加上// +build main\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e2. 在task.go头部加上// +build task\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e3. 编译住程序：go build -tags \u0026#39;main\u0026#39;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e4. 编译task：go build -tags \u0026#39;task\u0026#39; -o task.exe\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003e官方说明：\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eBuild Constraints\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eA build constraint is a line comment beginning with the directive \u0026nbsp;+build that lists the conditions under which a file should be included in the package. Constraints may appear in any kind of source file (not just Go), but they must appear near the top of the file, preceded only by blank lines and other line comments.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 27px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent;\"\u003eTo distinguish build constraints from package documentation, a series of build constraints must be followed by a blank line.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003cbr style=\"padding: 0px; margin: 0px; line-height: 10px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"/\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp style=\"padding: 0px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; line-height: 25px; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); font-family: \u0026#39;Microsoft YaHei\u0026#39;, Verdana, sans-serif, SimSun; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"padding: 0px;
